page.title: 02PATRICK MOORE - A BIOGRAPHY
page.content: Patrick Moore,Selsey's famous character and astronomer has lived here for 15 years.His interest in astronomy began when he was only 6 years old.Since then his fame has spread and his achievements include the writing of seventy two books.As well as astronomy,he has many other interests.These include music,cricket, tennis and chess.During the war, he was a Squadron Leader and he flew many aircraft,including Lancasters.He has made many television and radio appearances,both light entertainment and his long running series,"The Sky At Night".Mr.Moore plays for the Lords Taverners and has also played for Selsey.His worst live television experience was in the 1950's when a bluebottle flew into his mouth.All he could do was swallow it. Selsey would not be the same without him.
